title: The Call
description: When a dancer is murdered in her Virginia home, investigators are hopeful they can crack the case. But after interviewing a series of suspects, detectives realize the case is much more complicated than previously thought. Could an unexpected tip lead them to an unlikely person? Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on May 10, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
